alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 17 at 11:02AM MDT until April 17 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Interstate 80 Summit and adjacent foothills between Laramie and Cheyenne. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 3 PM MDT Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
